ProductInfo.Features:
Indoor/ Outdoor Security Camera; See in the Dark up to 50ft with Automatic Night Vision.
Weather Resistant Housing; Easily Connect to TVs and DVRs.
24/7 Record over 16 Days with 500GB HD; Connect to a TV or Monitor.
View Online or On a Smart Phone; Easy USB Backup; Included Mouse and Remote Control.
Continuous Recording; 24/7 Scheduled Recording; Motion Detected Recording; Search by Date, Time or   Event.
ProductInfo.Name: Kare D7824ht 4 Cctv 600tvl Indoor Outdoor Waterproof Surveillance Security Sony CCD Cameras with Automatic Night Vision 4ch DVR Complete System with H.264 500GB HD and Ir Remote Control & Mouse
